response.overview: PROSPECT begins with Danny Boy, a young biker - known as a PROSPECT, meaning a prospective member. He's determined to become a member of the Devil's Reapers MC. The story ends with Berdoo, the club president, who sees Danny Boy as a son, a younger version of himself who will someday run the club in his place. When Danny is shot, Berdoo is forced to decide - will he protect himself and the club, or save Danny's life? PROSPECT is a modern day Greek tragedy that explores brotherhood, brutality, and the human cost of living outside the law.
response.title: Prospect
